channel.title: Our Team on Impact17 | Partnering for a better world
channel.description: Recent content in Our Team on Impact17 | Partnering for a better world

item.title: Andy Andrea
item.description: Chief Executive Officer Andy is Director of Alliance4Impact, Founder & CEO of Impact17, and Chair of the Board of the Sustainable Impact Association, all dedicated to supporting and building partnerships for social good.

item.title: David Dickie
item.description: BDD David spent his early career in financial roles in manufacturing and publishing before a number of commercial roles in the advertising industry. David is passionate about helping alleviate poverty with a commercial approach to humanitarian issues.

item.title: Irina Bolgari
item.description: Head of Research Irina is Head of Research at Impact17 and Project Officer at Alliance4Impact. In both organizations, Irina promotes cross-sector partnerships on humanitarian action and the SDGs. In her current role, Irina oversees and conducts research projects to better understand multi-stakeholder partnerships from academic and practical perspectives.
